name: Marionette Company
description: One day, you stumble upon a broken Marionette, an android girl. Crying for help from inside a box in a shady alley. You take upon yourself to repair her, but she seems far from being human yet. Even her smile seems emotionless. The goal of this Visual Novel is to repair the Marionette girl by interacting with her and changing her body parts, to ultimately fix not only her body, but her heart.
alsoFor: PlayStation, PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita, Windows | Combined View
